question: Who was Peter Thangaraj?
explanation: Peter Thangaraj was an Indian Football Player. Havildar Peter Thangaraj was an Indian football player and a Non-Commissioned Officer (NCO) in Indian Army. Thangaraj played for the Indian national side at the 1956 Melbourne and 1960 Rome Olympics. He was voted Asiaâ€™s best goalkeeper in 1958. Thangaraj was a recipient of Arjuna Award for the year 1967.
